description:
Ashley is back, and with a few more shoots under her belt, this slut is ready to let it all go. The brutality is more than she has ever experienced, and the pain will be more than she can endure. Her body is pushed to the point of failure, and her mind starts to doubt it's ability to allow this to keep happening. The bondage keeps her so helpless that the fatigue from the ropes are enough suffering for most.
She fights off the pain with earth shattering screams, but that doesn't make it stop. She pleads and begs, but it only gets worse for her. Her orgasms are even brutal, yet they at least give the rest of her body a break from the torment.
title: Screaming Through the Pain
